org.axiondb.util
Class BTree

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.axiondb.util.BTree
public class BTree
extends Object

A B-Tree for integers, based on the implementation described in "Introduction to Algorithms" by Cormen, Leiserson and Rivest (CLR).

Version:
$Revision: 1.22 $ $Date: 2003/05/16 20:22:59 $

get

public Integer get(int key)
            throws IOException
Uses the shortest path to a matching entry and returns its value. Not necessarily the least value, the first entered, or the leftmost.

IOException

save

public void save(File dataDirectory)
          throws IOException
Saves the tree. It saves the counter file, writes out the node and then calls save recursively through the tree.
